pages.text: Paintbrushes are used in arts and crafts in real life, plus other cool things. In the mod, you can paint roads with them! Just craft a paint brush, and combine with yellow, white or blue dye to get started!
Craft this, then combine it with yellow, white or blue dye!

To paint a block or road, shift-right click on anything but a block to 'activate' the paintbrush. Then, shift-right click anything to change the pattern of the current brush. Right click to place that pattern on a block or road.

Paint brush patterns are saved per item to world and don't use durability, so go wild! Each pattern has a name, and some can convert regular roads into painted roads, which can then be harvested with a pickaxe. Road markings by themselves cannot be harvested.
Use a scrape tool to get rid of any paint on roads and converted painted roads into normal roads. This item also has no durability, so have fun!
Scrape Tool are quite useful for road marking mistakes.
